Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, July 27th, for approximately 1 hour.

Due to scheduled infrastructure upgrades, all our services and features on www.bitstamp.net will be temporarily unavailable on Wednesday, July 27th, beginning at 8.00 AM UTC (10.00 AM CET). The platform downtime will last approximately 1 hour.

After this period, most support services should be back online, but some features may take slightly longer to get back to full speed due to the nature of the upgrade. We will make sure to keep you updated on our Twitter channel.
